00023 using System;
00024 using Gtk;
00025 
00026 namespace Example.GtkScanner{
00027 
00028 public partial class MainWindow: Gtk.Window
00029 {   
00030     public MainWindow (): base (Gtk.WindowType.Toplevel){
00031         Build ();
00032         this.Scanner.Open("/dev/video0");
00033         Scanner.Rotate = true;
00034         this.VideoDevEntry.Text = "/dev/video0";
00035         this.UpdateMuteButton();
00036     }
00037     
00038     protected void OnDeleteEvent(object sender, DeleteEventArgs a){
00039         this.Scanner.Close();
00040         this.muteImage.Destroy();
00041         this.audioImage.Destroy();
00042         Application.Quit();
00043         a.RetVal = true;
00044     }
00045 
00046     protected virtual void OnScannerBarScanned (object sender, GtkZBar.BarScannedArgs e){
00047         this.ResultView.Buffer.Text = "Scanned: " + e.Symbol.ToString() + "\n" + this.ResultView.Buffer.Text;
00048     }
00049 
00050     protected virtual void OnOpenButtonClicked (object sender, System.EventArgs e){
00051         this.Scanner.Open(this.VideoDevEntry.Text);
00052     }
00053 
00054     protected virtual void OnScannerError (object sender, GtkZBar.ErrorEventArgs e){
00055         Console.WriteLine("Scanner error: " + e.Message);
00056     }
00057     
00058     //Load images from resources
00059     private Gtk.Image muteImage = new Gtk.Image(null, "muted.png");
00060     private Gtk.Image audioImage = new Gtk.Image(null, "audio.png");
00061     
00062     protected virtual void OnMuteButtonClicked (object sender, System.EventArgs e){
00063         this.Scanner.Mute = !this.Scanner.Mute;
00064         this.UpdateMuteButton();
00065     }
00066     
00067     private void UpdateMuteButton(){
00068         if(this.Scanner.Mute)
00069             this.MuteButton.Image = this.muteImage;
00070         else
00071             this.MuteButton.Image = this.audioImage;
00072     }
00073 
00074     protected virtual void OnFlipButtonClicked (object sender, System.EventArgs e){
00075         this.Scanner.Flip = this.FlipButton.Active;
00076     }
00077     
00078     protected virtual void OnRotateButtonClicked (object sender, System.EventArgs e){
00079         this.Scanner.Rotate = this.RotateButton.Active;
00080     }
00081 }
00082     
00083 }
